text: hananim-eun neohuiga bodeus gidong eobs-i haneul-eul changjohasyeossgo daeji wi e gojeongdoen san-eul sewo neohuilo hayeo geum heundeulliji ani hadolog hayeoss-eu myeo geu an-e modeun dongmul-i beonseonghado log hasyeossdoda ttohan haneullobuteo bi leul naelige hayeo geu an-e ongaj gwi han jongdeul-i ja-eung-eulo jalage hasyeoss nola
